    Layout: Sidebar Custom

    少于 1 分钟 阅读

    This post has a custom sidebar set in the post’s YAML Front Matter.

    An example of how that YAML could look is:

    sidebar:
  - title: "Title"
    image: http://placehold.it/350x250
    image_alt: "image"
    text: "Some text here."
  - title: "Another Title"
    text: "More text here."

    最新的: March 15, 2012
